response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would be an excellent addition to your endeavors. This product holds significant value to me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Considering its worth to both myself and you, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This price encapsulates not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive advantage. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 15000}
